jeva

Class Request

  • java.lang.Object
    • jeva.Request

  • public class Request
extends java.lang.Object
    A wrapper object for IHTTPSession, with the added function of the paramaters (i.e. "abc" for /test/<str> handling /test/abc)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Request(IHTTPSession session, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> params)
      Construct a new Request object with a given session and list of parameters.
